# Class UserContext

User context for graph execution.

Provides user-specific attributes and targeting information for personalized interactions.

#### Implements

  * [UserContextInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContextInterface)



##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Properties

attributes targetingKey

### Methods

  * new UserContext(  
attributes: [UserContextAttributes](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContextAttributes),  
targetingKey: string,  
): [UserContext]()

Creates a new UserContext instance.

#### Parameters

    * attributes: [UserContextAttributes](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContextAttributes)

User attributes as key-value pairs

    * targetingKey: string

Targeting key for user identification

#### Returns [UserContext]()

## Methods

### setAttributes

  * setAttributes(attributes: [UserContextAttributes](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContextAttributes)): void

Sets the attributes for this UserContext. This method updates the external UserContext with new attributes.

#### Parameters

    * attributes: [UserContextAttributes](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContextAttributes)

New user attributes as key-value pairs
